reviewText: too much like a TV movie.
Amazing Film and a terrific exploration of the idealism possible in the legal system even in the most difficult and bleakest of circumstances.
Sean Penn was good, quite young.
A very enlightening Movie and well acted a definitely worth seeing.  Will keep an eye out for similar shows on my ROKU
Received as ordered - was happy with this process and will continue to vist this site if my one concern is addressed
